content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. Let's discuss the price. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student so I was thinking of 350 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. I'm looking for a price that reflects the high quality and excellent location of my apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can increase my offer to 400 Euro. It's a fair price for a student apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While 400 Euro is more in line with what I had in mind, I still believe my apartment is worth more, considering its prime location and recent construction. Is there any way you could go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 450 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I'm looking for a price closer to 550 Euro per month. I believe that's fair considering the investment I've made in this property and the amenities it offers. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Maryam. If you're looking for a more affordable option, perhaps there are other apartments that might better fit your budget. Good luck with your search!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding, Mister Schmidt. I wish you good luck finding a tenant who can afford your apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Maryam. I appreciate your time and effort. Good luck with your studies! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
